title: Multimodal Data Analysis Project for Financial Risk Prediction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistics, Introduction to Machine Learning, and Understanding of Financial Risk Management Concepts
context.additional_context: Course providing hands-on financial risk prediction modeling via smartphone-based data collection/analysis, emphasizing collaborative learning in limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Acquiring the ability to design financial risk prediction models using voice and text data.
Implementing an analytical framework that integrates non-verbal cues (voice tone) and verbal cues (text).
Conducting risk prediction experiments using actual corporate earnings announcement data and interpreting the results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
